title: Resolution to adopt a new Constitution
content:
**A RESOLUTION**
*of the Congress of the Bayer Free State*
entitled "Resolution to adopt a new Constitution", reference number: RES_4-6-2021/00004

__RESOLVED__ that:
1. The [attached document](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/837540260644782100/850319690500276244/2021_Constitution.txt) shall be adopted as the new Constitution of the Bayer Free State.
2. The new Constitution shall take effect immediately after being passed by this Congress and signed by a member of the Executive Branch.

This Resolution shall require a supermajority in order to pass the Congress.
